data.actual_result: The magnifying glass stops and shows the channel list
data.short_description: In any message you typed (edited, unsent, etc. must be in send message area), zooming (holding on text and moving) over a # causes the magnifying glass to glitch a small bit.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type in a # (don't have to send) at the Send Message area - Zoom in at it (usually happens to the right)
